text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Trainer

Sure, okay!
Thank you very much!
Thank ya very much~!

Right, good job!
Kogane-chan, you're doing great today too!

Hehe, gotta make sure to
do our best for the festival, right~

That's a wonderful attitude! Well then,
I'll be looking forward to the next time, good job.

Kogane, good job.
Seems like everything's going smoothly──

──Producer,
...What are ya worrying about?

Huh?
N-No, it's just...

That look...
Seems different from usual.

...I see... Well, yeah. I trust everyone,
but I can't help but be concerned.

Producer is so kind.
He cares 'bout us.

Well, that's... just natural. Even now, if there's
something I can do, I'd do it right away.

Hehe, if that's the case,
then trust us even more!

The L'Antica that Producer created
is the strongest unit in the universe~!

No matter what happens,
we have the strength to overcome it!
